name: Authoritas
slogan: Data-science driven Content Marketing and SEO Software for digital marketing professionals
description:
SEO & Content Marketing have evolved.  It's not about keyword ranking and links anymore!

Search engines have evolved and are using the latest machine learning techniques to deliver better results for their users.  Now you can use similarly advanced techniques to deliver better results for your website(s).

With our cloud-based sofwtare platform you can:

* Use advanced data-science and machine learning techniques to analyse your whole market and discover how Google clusters related sites, pages and content in your marketplace.

* Automatically support your content marketing strategy by identifying and prioritising the right content marketing initiatives for your website(s).

* Benchmark your organic Market Share and set a strategy that will out-perform the market!

* Generate a better ROI on the efforts of your editorial, content marketing and SEO teams by focusing your efforts in the areas that will generate the best return.

team.name: Laurence O'Toole
team.bioHtml: Founder @Analytics SEO and @Authoritas - Entrepreneur into Big Data Analytics, SEO and data-driven digital marketing.

jobs.title: English and/or French Speaking - Sales Development Executives
jobs.description:
Authoritas.com offers leading eCommerce businesses, major brands and their agencies worldwide a cloud-based big-data-science-driven software platform that helps them transform their SEO and Content Marketing strategies.

We're looking to accelerate our growth in the UK and internationally, and we need to hire an ambitious and entrepreneurial sales development professional to work closely with the business development, content marketing and demand generation teams to drive UK and International sales.

So, if you are an ambitious graduate with 1 or 2 years’ commercial experience then please do get in touch.  You don’t need to be digital marketing expert as full training will be provided - you just need to have a great attitude, a strong work ethic, be personable and friendly on the telephone and a great communicator.

The role is varied and interesting and will suit someone who has a track record of success developing new business relationships for digital marketing agencies, software businesses or consultancies.

On a day-to-day basis you will be responsible for:

•	Developing new business relationships and sales opportunities in key verticals
•	Networking across existing client groups to win new business
•	Building your pipeline by developing an extensive network of industry contacts and through a proactive entrepreneurial approach
•	Working with the BDMs and senior management teams on client pitches and presentations

We would expect rapid progression for the right candidate into a more senior sales or business development role.

Minimum Qualifications and Requirements

•	Fluency in oral and written French and English
•	A bachelor’s degree or equivalent industry experience
•	Experience of lead generation or selling digital marketing solutions to senior executives
•	A solid grounding in all aspects of SEO/Content Marketing

Personal Skills

•	We’re looking for relevant sector experience but attitude and desire are just as important
•	Passionate with a burning desire to make a significant impact in your role
•	Strong interpersonal skills and communication skills
•	Strong commercial acumen
•	Organised and capable of working on multiple tasks efficiently
•	Ambitious – we’re looking for talented candidates that want to build a track-record of success

Why work with us?

We offer a competitive package, opportunities for international travel and have a passionate, fun culture and a great working environment.

Authoritas is based in Twickenham, SW London. (So, no nasty daily commute on the Tube!).  We offer a flexible working policy.

Benefits
•	Competitive remuneration package including EMI approved share option scheme
•	Attractive rates of uncapped commission
•	Career progression - we encourage personal development, autonomy and responsibility
•	Encouragement to attend international SEO conferences and training days
•	Flexibility to work on different projects with talented local and remote teams
•	Relaxed office environment – with a WIFI enabled garden for team BBQs in the summer


How to apply?

Drop our CEO Laurence O’Toole an email with your CV, achievements and salary expectations.

jobs.title: French SEO Consultant / SEO Account Manager
jobs.description:
We're looking for a French speaking client success manager with experience or interest in SEO and content marketing to join our growing team.

Authoritas is a rapidly growing software business based in the UK with customers all over the world. We have built a world-class SEO and content marketing software platform that helps companies of all sizes get the best return from their websites.  

To support this growth we’re looking for a personable and knowledgeable SEO enthusiast to manage our growing number of international accounts comprising leading brands, agencies, eCommerce sites and MNEs in France and across Europe.

The role is varied and interesting and will suit someone who has worked on multiple SEO campaigns as an SEO consultant or SEO Account Exec/Manager; or has worked in Digital Marketing and is now looking for a broader commercial role and opportunities for further career development and responsibility.

On a day-to-day basis you will be responsible for:

•	Keeping our customers happy and driving customer advocacy
•	Managing accounts in the UK and internationally as we grow the business
•	Providing online demonstrations and training of the software
•	Managing key accounts and growing revenues through effective account strategies
•	Developing new business through networking and word-of-mouth referrals
•	Specifying new customer-driven feature requests to the product and engineering team
 
Minimum Qualifications and Requirements

•	Fluency in French and English
•	A bachelor’s degree or equivalent industry experience
•	1 to 2 years’ experience as an account manager or other client facing role

Personal Skills

•	Passionate and results-oriented with a burning desire to make a significant impact in your role
•	Strong verbal and written communication skills 
•	Strong analysis, problem solving and troubleshooting skills
•	Organised and capable of working on multiple tasks efficiently
•	Very strong interpersonal skills

Technical Skills (Preferable but not essential as full training will be provided)

•	A solid grounding in all aspects of SEO including the technical aspects
•	Good working experience of Google Analytics and Google Search Console
•	Extensive use of SEO Tools and Excel

Why work with us?

We offer a competitive package, opportunities for international travel and have a passionate and fun culture, flexible working arrangements and a great working environment.

Authoritas is based in Twickenham, SW London. 

We’re looking to double the team in 2020 and this is a superb opportunity to be a part of a growing business and even own a part of the business through our generous share option scheme.
 
Benefits

•	Competitive remuneration package including Bonus/Commission and EMI approved share option scheme
•	Career progression - we encourage personal development, autonomy and responsibility
•	Encouragement to attend international SEO conferences and training days
•	Flexibility to work on different projects with talented local and remote teams
•	Relaxed office environment – with a WIFI enabled garden for team BBQs in the summer
